clinical_history: Limb swelling, rule out deep venous thrombosis.
findings: Uterus appears mildly thickened; endometrial thickness measures 12.6 mm.
Soft tissue region demonstrates mildly thickened without fluid collection.
Prostate is ill-defined; volume approximately 27.02 cc.
Common bile duct measures 37.27 mm, within normal limits.
Thyroid gland shows mildly heterogeneous echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Right kidney demonstrates normal, no hydronephrosis.
